title: FlexFret
description: I designed the FlexFret company website in collaboration with a design team, using Figma as our primary tool. The project involved creating a user-centered interface, ensuring responsiveness across multiple devices, and implementing a cohesive design system, including a carefully curated color palette and typography to enhance usability and visual appeal.

I collaborated with Flexfret's development team to transform UI/UX designs into a fully responsive website using HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Node.js. My role involved converting design mockups into clean, efficient code while ensuring cross-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness. By leveraging Tailwind CSS for streamlined styling and Node.js for workflow automation, I contributed to a visually appealing and user-friendly website that effectively showcased Flexfret's services. This project highlights my expertise in front-end development, teamwork, and modern web technologies.

title: Play Time Reserve
description: I designed a comprehensive UI/UX for a stadium reservation app, focusing on enabling users to book football stadiums or join existing matches. The project included creating a full design system with a cohesive color palette, typography, and reusable UI components, as well as establishing a clear visual hierarchy and app architecture for intuitive navigation. The result is a user-friendly platform that simplifies the process of reserving stadiums or joining games, tailored for football enthusiasts.
